title: Tech Trends: During Newark Tech Week, panel of diverse women discuss startup challenges - ROI-NJ.com

description: Newark Tech Week 2021, sponsored by Invest Newark and the New Jersey Economic Development Authority, and presented by =SPACE, a coworking facility in Newark, took place recently.
